ValidationRule.description: This will prevent a user from moving the stage of a Deal backwards
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name == 'System Administrator'), CASE(StageName, "Initial Review",1, "Data Tape Received",2, "Issue Term Sheet/Order Appraisal",3, "Term Sheet Issued",4, "Term Sheet Signed/Deposit Collected",5, 6) < CASE(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Initial Review",1, "Data Tape Received",2, "Issue Term Sheet/Order Appraisal",3, "Term Sheet Issued",4, "Term Sheet Signed/Deposit Collected",5, 6))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Stage of the Deal cannot be moved backwards. If this is a special case, please request this to Salesforce Administrator
